title: TFR Ep. 561: Zola, No Sudden Move, Who Dat?!?
description:
This week on The First Run, it’s EXTREME-casting.  Tropical storm/Hurricane Elsa is bearing down on Florida and JC of Screenfix is here to once again drive Chris insane. First up, it’s the Twitter thread come to life black comedy road trip epic that is ‘Zola’.  Primarily shot locally here in Tampa, Chris hopes to identify all the local spots and see if this whole thing actually works, but is quickly undone by JC’s unique, we’ll say, perspective.  Then it’s on to Steven Soderbergh’s latest streaming exclusively on HBOMax, ‘No Sudden Move’.  Soderbergh returns to the twisty heist flick featuring a stellar cast out to get their hands on an incredibly dull McGuffin.  And more arguments are had. There’re the big releases on physical media, featuring the Straight to DVD and Streaming Picks of the Week!  The show then wraps with Chris’s first time role playing with a guest in ‘Who Dat’.  It’s always awkward the first time.  Join us for 90 minutes of entertaining madness as Chris is finally put in his place.

00:00-30:05: Intro/Zola (seriously, 30 minutes)

30:06-43:17: Physical Media Picks

43:18-1:03:20: No Sudden Move

1:03:21-1:25:54: Who Dat?!?

1:25:55-1:29:30: Wrap Up

Theme music by Jamal Malachi Ford-Bey

Twitter

Instagram

Facebook
